# Protocol 3A: Regional model workflow
In this notebook, we will create a diagram for the workflow that regional modellers should follow under FishMIP Protocol 3A.  
  
## Loading libraries
  
```{r, warning = F, echo = F}
library(DiagrammeR)
library(DiagrammeRsvg)
```
